summary: The company hasn’t confirmed cuts despite multiple state notices and worker posts.

headline: Silver Elephant Early Warning Report
summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - September 3, 2025) - Silver Elephant Mining Corp. (TSX: ELEF) (OTCQB: SILEF) (FSE: 1P2) ("Silver Elephant" or the "Company") announces that on September 2, 2025, it sold 4,000,000 common shares in the capital of Oracle Commodity Holding Corp. ("Oracle") through the facilities of the TSX Venture Exchange for total consideration of $60,000 (the "Oracle Share Sale").Prior to the Oracle Share Sale, Silver Elephant held 24,700,110 Oracle common shares,..

headline: SQL4Fusion Launches as Community and SQL Editor for Oracle Fusion Developers
summary: A new hub is now live for Oracle Fusion Cloud developers, consultants and technical architects. SQL4Fusion blends a developer community with a live SQL editor, giving teams a faster and more reliable way to work with Fusion data.

raw.headline: SQL4Fusion Launches as Community and SQL Editor for Oracle Fusion Developers
raw.summary: A new hub is now live for Oracle Fusion Cloud developers, consultants and technical architects. SQL4Fusion blends a developer community with a live SQL editor, giving teams a faster and more reliable way to work with Fusion data.

headline: Salesforce’s Struggling Stock Needs Earnings to Show AI Progress
summary: Salesforce shares are down 23% this year, putting them among the 30 worst-performing stocks in the S&P 500 Index.  The plunge has been particularly dramatic in light of the strong showings by software giants like Microsoft Corp., Oracle Corp., and Palantir Technologies Inc., all of whom are considered to be stronger in AI.  While Salesforce, which makes customer relationship management software, has its own AI products, concerns about its long-term trajectory mean the shares may languish even if the company posts strong earnings when it reports after the bell on Wednesday.

raw.headline: Salesforce’s Struggling Stock Needs Earnings to Show AI Progress

headline: NYC Health + Hospitals Collaborates with Oracle to Enhance and Upgrade Key Business Processes
summary: NYC Health + Hospitals, the largest municipal health care system in the U.S., will upgrade to Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications to streamline business processes and support the delivery of high-quality health care services. Using Oracle Fusion Applications, an integrated set of cloud applications to manage finance, supply chain, and HR processes, NYC Health + Hospitals will be able to increase efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance the employee and patient experience.

raw.headline: NYC Health + Hospitals Collaborates with Oracle to Enhance and Upgrade Key Business Processes

headline: Natural Grocers® Invites Northwest Tucson Customers to Celebrate the 10th Anniversary of Its Oracle and Orange Grove Store, September 5-7, 2025
summary: Natural Grocers®, the nation's largest family-operated natural and organic grocery retailer, is celebrating the 10-year anniversary of its northwest Tucson store at 6320 N. Oracle Rd., with exclusive discounts and in-store festivities for the community. From Sept. 5–7, customers are invited to join the celebration with special {N}power® members-only deals and fun for everyone.
